name: Pizza
description: A classic Italian dish made with a flatbread base, tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings.

name: Tacos
description: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a small hand-sized corn or wheat tortilla topped with a filling.

name: Butter Chicken
description: An Indian curry made with a spiced tomato, butter, and cream sauce, served with tender chicken.

name: Sushi
description: A Japanese dish featuring vinegared rice, raw fish, and vegetables rolled in seaweed.

name: Burger
description: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup with a rich, flavorful broth, sliced meat, boiled egg, and vegetables.

name: Paella
description: A Spanish rice dish that includes seafood, chicken, and vegetables cooked in saffron-flavored broth.

name: Falafel
description: A Middle Eastern dish made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, formed into balls and deep-fried.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: An Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, peanuts, scrambled eggs, and bean sprouts.
